first_para: Karl Turner (born 15 April 1971) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Kingston upon Hull East since 2010.

full.extract:
Karl Turner (born 15 April 1971) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Kingston upon Hull East since 2010.
^ The London Gazette: no. 59418. p. 8747. 13 May 2010.
^ "Karl Turner MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC News. Retrieved 25 July 2010.
full.title: Karl Turner (politician)
